Ebe foto si, @IsiakaAdeleke1
Ademola Adeleke zọọ ọkwa gọvanọ Osun steeti n'aha PDP n'afọ 2018
N'ikpe ya, Othman Musa bụ onye ọkaikpe n'ikpe ahụ kwuru na Adeleke bara ụlọakwụkwọ n'afọ 1976 mana o nweghi ihe akaebe gosiri na ọ gụchara n'afọ 1980.
Ọ gara n'ihu kwuo na asambodo nke Adeleke nyere ndị ụlọọrụ Inec bụ adịgboroja.
Osun Election: Ụlọikpe enyela Adeleke mmeri
Mana onye ọkaiwu na-anọchite anya Adeleke kwuru na ọ ga-agbaha ya bụ ikpe n'ụlọikpe ka nke ahụ.
Asambodo ụlọakwụkwọ sekọndịrị bụ otu ihe n'ime ihe iwu nara onye ọbụla chọrọ ịzọ ọkwa na Naịjrịa
Ebe foto si, Getty Images
Nigerian youths feel say Police dey always look tins like clothe, tattoo and dreadlocks to take determine say dem be criminal
Ndị uweojii kwuru na ihe mere ha jị anwụchi ndị bu isi dada maka na ha nwereike ị nọ n'otu nzuzo dị icheiche.
Mana ọnụ na-ekwuchitere ndị uweojii na Legọs bụ Bala Elkanah kwuru na agbanyeghi nke a, ndị uweojii e kwesighi ị na-anwụchi ndị ntoroọbịa ka o si maasị ha.
End SARS: Anyị anwụchiela ndị ọrụ anyị aka ha dị n'ọnwụ Kolade Johnson
Nke a na-abịa dịka ndị mmadụ na-akpọ oku ka a machie SARS maka ebubo eboro ha na ha gburu otu nwoke bụ Kolade Johnson.
Kọmishọna ndịuweojii gara njem ụlọakwa na be ya iji ti ezinaụlọ ya aka n'obi.
Ebe foto si, Getty Images
Nyesom Wike bụ aka na-achị Rivers Steeti kamgbe afọ anọ gara aga
Inec adọtịala mkpọpụta mpụtara ntuliaka e mere na Rivas steeti rue elekere iri nke ụtụtụ echi.
Ebe foto si, @NGRSenate
Otu kpọrọ onwe ha Coalition of South-East Leaders (COSEYL) kwuputara nke a mgbe ha na-etinye ọnụ n'etu APC ga-esi kee ọkwa ụlọomeiwu nke na-abịa.
Ebe foto si, Facebook/Orji Uzor Kalu
Otu jikọtara ndị zọrọ ọkwa ịbụ ndị omeiwu n'ọwụwa anyanwụ ekwuola na ha kwụ aka chịbụrụ Abịa steeti bụ Orji Uzo Kalu n'azụ na njem ya ịbụ osote onyeisi ụlọomeiwu ukwu.
Ahmed Musa gosiri ụwa ihe e ji ụkwụ eme ka goolu o nyere n'asọmpi Iko Mbaụwa afọ 2018 nwetara ihe nrite bekee kpọrọ 'goal of the season'.
O nwetekwara "player of the year", ka Onome Ebi nwetere nke ụmụnwaanyị.
